overview: Tiffany loves Michael. Michael loves Tiffany. But he also loves Ashleigh. After Tiffany finds out that he's been unfaithful, she gives him one more chance to prove that he will do right by her. What follows is a wildly hilarious experience that's sure to show the different perspectives of the girlfriend, the boyfriend, and the side chick. Who's right, who's wrong, and who gets even?
tagline: She gives him one more chance to prove that he will do right.
title: The Morning After
